description.value:
Contains information and metadata for addresses defined in Norwegian Master Person Index (FREG) and Norwegian Directorate of e-Health's health related Master Person Index.
The profile defines information structure of unstructured norwegian or interntional street address (internasjonalAdresseFrittFormat, PostadresseFrittFormat), as defined by FREG.
Also used for AddressType of PreferertKontaktadresse, to give information about the preferred contact adress of the person.

definition.value: The Indicates the citicen choice of preferred address for contact as registered in FREG. The preferred addresstype indicates which address in the document is the person's preferred contact address. Only used for AddressType of PreferertKontaktadresse. PreferertKontaktadresse always has a AddressContenttype of PostadresseFrittFormat
The preferred addresstype indicates which address in the document is the person's preferred contact address.

adresselinjer fra FREG, Norske adresser oppgis med opptil 4 linjer, internasjonale adresser kan oppgis med ubegrenset antall linjer.
En en-dimensjonal tabell med opptil 4 tekstlinjer for å kunne uttrykke en norsk postadresse fullt ut. Det skal være plass til 1: coAdressenavn, 2: adressetilleggsnavn, 3: adressenavn med adressenummer og 4: postnummer med poststedsnavn i dette formatet.
This component contains the house number, apartment number, street name, street direction, P.O. Box number, delivery hints, and similar address information.

gd-Address: All Norwegian addresses are from Master Person Index uses this element for "poststed" or "postedsnavn". International addresses uses this element to communicate the name of the city (byEllerStedsnavn i FREG).
The name of the poststed or city. When a postalcode is given the name of the city must be according to the official list of postalcodes used in Norway.
The name of the city, town, village or other community or delivery center.

Internasjonal postkode eller norsk postnummer fra FREG
A postal code designating a region defined by the postal service.
In Norway this is af four digit number defined by the norwegian postal service.

landkode fra FREG, kode for å representere et land, FREG benytter ISO 3166-3
Country (e.g. can be ISO 3166 3 letter code) Country - a nation as commonly understood or generally accepted.
